biotools.summary: Deconvolving the effects of pervasive and autonomous transcription of transposable elements | TeXP is a pipeline to gauge the autonomous transcription level of L1 subfamilies using short read RNA-seq data | #About TeXP is a pipeline for quantifying abundances of Transposable Elements transcripts from RNA-Seq data. TeXP is based on the assumption that RNA-seq reads overlapping Transposable Elements is a composition of pervasive transcription signal and autonomous transcription of Transposable Elements
